name: SSL 2.0 deprecated protocol
name_vi: Giao thức mã hóa cũ không an toàn SSL 2.0

vuln.name: SSL 2.0 deprecated protocol
vuln.synopsis: The SSL server encrypts traffic using an old deprecated protocol (SSL 2.0) with known weaknesses
vuln.description: The remote service accepts connections encrypted using SSLv2 and/or SSLv3, which reportedly suffers from several cryptographic flaws and has been deprecated for several years. An attacker may be able to exploit these issues to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks or decrypt communications between the affected service and clients.
vuln.impact: An attacker may be able to exploit these issues to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks or decrypt communications between the affected service and clients.
vuln.solution: Disable SSL 2.0 and use TLS 1.2 (or higher) instead.
